abstract: The university hopes that starting a joint-degree program with City College will enhance its bid to create an engineering school in New York.
snippet: The university hopes that starting a joint-degree program with City College will enhance its bid to create an engineering school in New York.
lead_paragraph: In the chess match to determine which university will get a chance to build a graduate school of applied sciences on public land in New York City, Stanford is trying what might be called a C.C.N.Y. stratagem.

headline.main: Stanford Teams With City College (Think Engineering School)
